3 Pagination

Simple pagination inspired by Rdio, great for apps and search results. The large block is hard to miss, easily scalable, and provides large click areas.

3.1 Standard pagination

  • «
  • 1
  • 2
  • 3
  • 4
  • 5
  • »
<div class="pagination">
  <ul>
    <li><a href="#">&laquo;</a></li>
    <li><a href="#">1</a></li>
    <li><a href="#">2</a></li>
    <li><a href="#">3</a></li>
    <li><a href="#">4</a></li>
    <li><a href="#">5</a></li>
    <li><a href="#">&raquo;</a></li>
  </ul>
</div>

3.2 Disabled and active states

  • «
  • 1
  • 2
  • 3
  • 4
  • 5
  • »
<div class="pagination">
  <ul>
    <li class="disabled"><a href="#">&laquo;</a></li>
    <li class="active"><a href="#">1</a></li>
    <li><a href="#">2</a></li>
    <li><a href="#">3</a></li>
    <li><a href="#">4</a></li>
    <li><a href="#">5</a></li>
    <li><a href="#">&raquo;</a></li>
  </ul>
</div>

3.3 Alignment

Add one of two optional classes to change the alignment of pagination links: .pagination-centered and .pagination-right.

  • «
  • 1
  • 2
  • 3
  • 4
  • 5
  • »
.pagination-centered
Centered.
  • «
  • 1
  • 2
  • 3
  • 4
  • 5
  • »
.pagination-right
Right aligned.
  • «
  • 1
  • 2
  • 3
  • 4
  • 5
  • »
<div class="pagination ">
  <ul>
    <li><a href="#">&laquo;</a></li>
    <li><a href="#">1</a></li>
    <li><a href="#">2</a></li>
    <li><a href="#">3</a></li>
    <li><a href="#">4</a></li>
    <li><a href="#">5</a></li>
    <li><a href="#">&raquo;</a></li>
  </ul>
</div>

3.4 Sizing

Fancy larger or smaller pagination? Add .pagination-large, .pagination-small, or .pagination-mini for additional sizes.

  • «
  • 1
  • 2
  • 3
  • 4
  • 5
  • »
.pagination-large
Large.
  • «
  • 1
  • 2
  • 3
  • 4
  • 5
  • »
.pagination-small
Small.
  • «
  • 1
  • 2
  • 3
  • 4
  • 5
  • »
.pagination-mini
Mini.
  • «
  • 1
  • 2
  • 3
  • 4
  • 5
  • »
<div class="pagination ">
  <ul>
    <li><a href="#">&laquo;</a></li>
    <li><a href="#">1</a></li>
    <li><a href="#">2</a></li>
    <li><a href="#">3</a></li>
    <li><a href="#">4</a></li>
    <li><a href="#">5</a></li>
    <li><a href="#">&raquo;</a></li>
  </ul>
</div>
